title: One Direction unveil "Perfect" video
text:
One Direction unveil "Perfect" video 2:17pm BST - 00:59 
The chart-topping foursome release the music video for their new single ''Perfect''. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
ROUGH CUT (NO REPORTER NARRATION) Chart-topping boy band One Direction unveiled the black-and-white music video for their new single, "Perfect", which has already received more than two million views on YouTube. Their fifth album, called "Made in the A.M.", will be released on November 13. One Direction's remaining members - Harry Styles, Niall Horan, Liam Payne and Louis Tomlinson - said that they would be taking a break in March 2016. The foursome were a five piece until Zayn Malik quit in March earlier this year.
